1.title: Rise of the Snakes
1.plot: After the Ninja got the Golden Weapons, they want to figure out how to Unlock them. Lloyd releases the Serpentine, a Pack of snakes, that hate Ninjago.

2.title: Home
2.plot: Back in training mode with the looming threat of Lloyd and the Hypnobrai, Zane wanders after a Falcon and lands himself in a heap of trouble.

3.title: Snakebit
3.plot: Lloyd unlocks a second tribe - The Fangpyres - to help him regain control. The Ninja are busy setting up their new HQ that Zane discovered, but are called to duty when the Fangpyres attack the village where Jay's family lives.

4.title: Never Trust a Snake
4.plot: After the Fangpyres join forces with the Hypnobrai, Lloyd awakens Pythor - the last remaining snake of the Anacondrai tribe. Pythor steals a map from him that will show him where the remaining two snakes tribes dwell.

5.title: Can of Worms
5.plot: Lloyd moves in and tries to make nice by helping out with chores, but he just gets in the way. Pythor has awoken the Vipoids and the Constrictaurs and an all out snake war has taken over Ninjago.

6.title: The Snake King
6.plot: Pythor declares himself to be the destined leader who will reawaken The Great Devourer - an ancient beast who can't be killed and will consume all of Ninjago.

7.title: Tick Tock
7.plot: When the four ninja follow the mysterious falcon into the woods, they stumble on a hidden work shop where Zane learns the secret about his past and in the process, he is the first ninja to unlock his true potential.

8.title: Once Bitten, Twice Shy
8.plot: Jay and Nya have to cut their first date in Mega-Monster Amusement Park short as the Serpentine are on their way to retrieve the first or four fang blades to be used to awaken the Great Devourer.

9.title: The Royal Blacksmiths
9.plot: The four ninja go undercover as a dance troupe and enter a talent contest in their quest to win "The Blade Cup" where one of the fang blades is hidden.

10.title: The Green Ninja
10.plot: The ninjas are suspicious when Lord Garmadon moves in to help searching for his missing son - but realize they have to work together in their attempt to rescue Lloyd from the snakes.

11.title: All of Nothing
11.plot: The ninja and Sensei Wu try to infiltrate the Serpentines' inner sanctum and walk right into a trap, and when Lloyd's rescue mission fails, there is only one person who can help them, namely the evil Lord Garmadon.

12.title: The Rise of the Great Devourer
12.plot: The ninja haste to the lost city of Ouroboros to try to stop Pythor from awaking The Great Devourer but it is a race against time.

13.title: Day of the Great Devourer
13.plot: Disaster threatens as the ninja must fight to defeat the all consuming Great Devourer in a desperate attempt to save Ninjago.

1.title: Darkness Shall Rise
1.plot: Just as the rebuilding effort in Ninjago begins, the four ninjas come to realize that evil has started to resurface with Lord Garmadon forging the ninjas' lost Golden Weapons into a Mega-Weapon with unspeakable powers.

2.title: Pirates vs. Ninja
2.plot: When Garmadon by accident brings to life the original owners of the Black Bounty - the ruthless Captain Soto and his Pirates - it is up to our ninjas to stop them from plundering Ninjago City.

3.title: Double Trouble
3.plot: When our heroes are invited back to Darkly's Boarding School, they discover it's a trap set up by Lord Garmadon and his evil replica ninjas created by Garmadon's new Mega-Weapon.

4.title: Ninjaball Run
4.plot: When the ninja learn that Darreth's Mojo Dojo is to be destroyed and Darreth doesn't have the money to save it, our heroes enter the annual NinjaBall Run to win its cash prize in order to save the dojo.

5.title: Child's Play
5.plot: When the Ninja interrupt Garmadon from using his Mega-Weapon to 'turn back the clock' and bring to life the fossils of a monster, the Ninja are hit and turned into kids and are now forced to enlist Lloyd's help to battle the awakened monster.

6.title: Wrong Place, Wrong Time
6.plot: When Garmadon travels back in time in order to undo the past and rid the Ninja from the future, the Ninja follow him and try to stop him by using the Golden Weapons from the past to clash against Garmadon's Mega-Weapon.

7.title: The Stone Army
7.plot: The ninja face off with an exhibit of a Stone Samurai Warrior that the toxic venom from the Great Devourer has brought to life while Garmadon manages to find a fabled Dark Island that is said to hold dark powers.

8.title: The Day Ninjago Stood Still
8.plot: The ninja try to flee from the rest of the Stone Army that has been brought to life by the Devourer's toxic venom - and things get a lot worse when Garmadon arrives with a 'Helmet of Darkness' and seizes control of the Stone Army.

9.title: The Last Voyage
9.plot: The Ninjas, Lloyd, Sensei Wu and Misako journey to the Dark Island to find a 'Temple of Light' that can restore the Ninjas' elemental powers but are attacked by Starteeth (barnacle-like star fish) that start eating through their ship.

10.title: Island of Darkness
10.plot: After battling off Garmadon's Stone Army, the Ninjas finally arrive at the Temple of Light where they harness their pure elemental powers, concentrating them onto Lloyd who becomes more powerful than he ever imagined.

11.title: The Last Hope
11.plot: When the Ninjas' attempt to return Garmadon's 'Helmet of Darkness' to its perch at the Celestial Clock in order to prevent the final battle between Lloyd and his father from beginning fails, a Super Weapon is created that can destroy all of Ninjago.

12.title: The Overlord Cometh
12.plot: When Garmadon uses his new Super-Weapon to turn Jamakai Village evil, he unwittingly unsettles the balance, allowing the spirit of the Overlord to cross over and possesses his body.

13.title: Rise of the Spinjitzu Master
13.plot: A great darkness has fallen upon Ninjago as Garmadon's Super-Weapon has turned it evil but Lloyd and the Ninjas discover that light is more powerful than dark - and the final and ultimate battle is on.

1.title: The Surge
1.plot: After a long time of peace, the Ninja come back into action. The defeated Overlord, and the technology now is to get back revenge on Lloyd. The Ninja have the powerful Techo Blades, but have no clue how to use them.

2.title: The Art of the Silent Fist
2.plot: The Ninja go hiding from the Digital Overlord's Robots, bit follow them wherever they go. They have to unlock the Techno Blades to save Ninjago City from his Mutiny.

3.title: Blackout
3.plot: The power is out in all of Ninjago but the hard drive containing the Digital Overlord has been stolen by a mysterious Stranger who is now sending alternatively powered Nindroids to attack the Ninja and capture Lloyd.

4.title: The Curse of the Golden Master
4.plot: The ninjas' search for the Stranger and the hard drive with the Digital Overlord brings them deep underground where they are assisted by an old enemy. But the Stranger and his Nindroids are getting ever closer to capturing Lloyd.

5.title: Enter the Digiverse
5.plot: Pythor and the Nindroids have captures Lloyd. They are taking away his powers to reveal the Overlord. The Ninja must use the Techno Blades and save Lloyd.

6.title: Codename: Arcturus
6.plot: Lloyd is free but Pythor and the Overlord are nowhere to be found. The Ninja discover Codename: Arcturus. But what is it? They go somewhere they never knew they would.

7.title: The Void
7.plot: The Ninja are staying alive out there in soace, as the Nindroids come to collect the weapons from the Masters of Spinjitzu. Who will make it back safely? Nindroid or Ninja?

8.title: The Titanium Ninja
8.plot: The ninja repair the broken Arcturus ship to return home. When they do, they find the Overlord has used the golden weapons to return to the physical world as the all powerful Golden Master.

1.title: The Invitation
1.plot: Thinking Zane may still be alive, the Ninja is devastated, and doesn't want to come back to be ninja. They get an I'll invitation to Chen's Tournament Of Elements.

2.title: Only One Can Remain
2.plot: The ninja discover that the tournament isn't about glory, but about Chen stealing everyone's elemental powers.

3.title: Versus
3.plot: To drive the Ninja apart, Chen and Clouse put Jay and Cole to face eachother.

4.title: Ninja Roll
4.plot: In the last round of Phase One, the elemental masters compete in the Thunderblade, where Lloyd must compete against the master of form.

5.title: Spy for a Spy
5.plot: With only 8 people left in the tournament, the ninja discover a spy among the competitors.

6.title: Spellbound
6.plot: Chen decides that it is time to end the tournament tricking all the elemental fighters into a round where no one wins.

7.title: The Forgotten Element
7.plot: With all of the elemental masters captured, Lloyd must find a way to save everyone. Meanwhile, Cole and Zane think of ways to escape.

8.title: The Day of the Dragon
8.plot: While the Ninja control the island, Chen figures out Skylor can complete the Spell. The Ninja figure out there Elemental Dragons.

9.title: The Greatest Fear of All
9.plot: With Chen's spell complete, he needs only one ingredient to complete the transformation: the sweat of a true Anacondrai.

10.title: The Corridor of Elders
10.plot: With the elemental alliance scattered across Ninjago and Chen having discovered how to make the spell permanent, the balance is at risk as Garmadon makes his last stand against evil at the corridor of elders.

1.title: Winds of Change
1.plot: Wu opens a tea shop to help with his retirement and asks the ninja to help him advertise it. Lloyd is asked to go on a solo mission, but discovers that it is a trap set by a cursed spirit named Morro that has escaped from the Cursed Realm.

2.title: Ghost Story
2.plot: Wu reveals that the spirit that has taken over Lloyd's body was of his first pupil, the Master of Wind. The ninja then embark on a mission to save Lloyd. Wu and Misako tell Nya she holds a power she never knew about.

3.title: Stiix and Stones
3.plot: The ninja arrives in Stiix to find Ronin, who has the Scroll of Airjitzu. However, Morro is also on the hunt for the scroll and isn't too far behind.

4.title: The Temple on Haunted Hill
4.plot: Morro has the scroll. The Ninja find a new way to learn Airjitzu by visiting the Haunted House of Sensei Yang. Nya doubts she is the Water ninja. So Ronin takes her to Souri Cave, but they have people waiting for them

5.title: Peak-a-Boo
5.plot: Now that the ninja knows Airjitzu, they get prepared to hunt for the second clue to the tomb. They must embark to Cloud Kingdom and retrieve the Sword of Sanctuary. It's a race against Morro and his ghostly allies to get to Cloud Kingdom before the gateway passes.

6.title: Kingdom Come
6.plot: The ninja arrives in Cloud Kingdom and discovers it is the realm where destinies are written, but the ninja needs to turn their attention to finding the Sword of Sanctuary before Morro can.

7.title: The Crooked Path
7.plot: The ninja has Airjitzu and the sword, but they need to figure out the third and final clue before they can get to the tomb. Things are complicated when Morro offers Ronin freedom of his soul in exchange for the sword.

8.title: Grave Danger
8.plot: The ninja uses Ronin's airship to travel to the First Spinjitzu Master's tomb, but they find that Morro has beaten them to it. Can they catch up to him, beat the deadly tests and find the tomb before he can?

9.title: Curse World: Part 1
9.plot: Morro, with the realm crystal, has opened a portal to the Cursed Realm and ghosts have taken over the City of Stiix. The ninja team go undercover to infiltrate the city and get Lloyd to the crystal before Morro's new master can arrive.

10.title: Curse World: Part 2
10.plot: Lloyd is now trapped in the Cursed Realm and the Preeminent has arrived in Ninjago. Now it's up to the remaining ninja to stop the Preeminent from cursing Ninjago, but her army of ghosts isn't making it easy.

1.title: Infamous
1.plot: After destroying the Cursed Realm and saving Ninjago, the Ninja have discovered newfound fame. But they must be careful what they wish for because a new evil named Nadakhan the Djinn is freed and a new age of piracy has begun.

2.title: Public Enemy Number One
2.plot: Police tell Ronin to track down the Fugitive Ninja. The police Get Misako, who is in police Custody. Nadakhan traps Misako in the Teacup of Thiiwan. Zane goes to the library where Ronin captures him.

3.title: Enkrypted
3.plot: Falsely imprisoned, the Ninja are at their lowest point, but find an unlikely friend in an old enemy. Meanwhile, Nadakhan rescues his marooned crew and gains a new perspective, along with a new mysterious plan.

4.title: Misfortune Rising
4.plot: The ninja's search for Nadakhan's ship turns up nothing. Nadakhan's crew is struggling to handle an airship which used to sail only on the oceans. Nadakhan confronts Jay and talks him into making a wish that will win him Nya. Jay wishes that he wasn't born in a junkyard and was rich. The next moment, he receives a letter saying his father has died and he has inherited his estate. Jay rushes home to find his parents in the junkyard and finds out they are fine, but they reveal that he is adopted. Jay discovers that his real father is the actor who played his favorite ...

5.title: On a Wish and a Prayer
5.plot: The ninja travel to Tiger Widow Island to get venom from a tiger widow spider to use against Nadakhan. The plan goes awry when Nadakhan and his sky pirates arrive to intervene.

6.title: My Dinner with Nadakhan
6.plot: Jay must do what it takes to escape the villainous clutches of Nadakhan whilst the remaining ninja attempt to survive and escape Tiger Widow Island.

7.title: Wishmasters
7.plot: The ninja are trying to save Jay from Nadakhan's ship. Two screenwriters, Kevin and Dan, suggest that they disguise themselves as Sky Pirates. The ninja infiltrate the ship and Cole goes to slip the venom into Nadakhan's drink. But he stumbles on Jay, helps him escape, and forgets to use the venom. The two of them, plus Nya and Lloyd, wind up captured by the pirates. For a while, it looks like the ninja might win out until Cole wishes they were "all out of here" - and the pirates' airship starts to tilt dangerously. Lloyd wishes to be wise like Sensei Wu and starts to...

8.title: The Last Resort
8.plot: Jay and Nya are hiding at the Lighthouse where Zane's Father was held captive. Nakahdan makes a wish to find Nya. Nya and Jay set up Booby Traps to slow Nakahdan's crew down. Nya gets captured by the Pirates.

9.title: Operation Land Ho!
9.plot: Nakahdan's crew gets Nya ready for the wedding. Nya tells Jay where the Venom is. Jay gets Other allies to help him defeat Nakahdan. Jay succeeds on rescuing Kai, Lloyd, Cole, Zane, Wu, and Misako.

10.title: The Way Back
10.plot: The restored ninja rush to save Nya, but they are too late: the wedding to Nadakhan happens. Nadakhan now has unlimited wishes and no rules governing them. Clancee betrays Nadakhan and tells the ninja where the dart with the venom is. Angered, Nadakhan banishes Clancee, Doubloon, and Monkey Wretch with a wish. Dogshank and Flintlocke team up with the ninja to battle magical duplicates of Nadakhan. Meanwhile, the djinn casts a spell to restore Delara's spirit in Nya's body. The ninja take over Misfortune's Keep and ram it into the Djinn Temple. During the battle, ...

1.title: Hands of Time
1.plot: Master Wu mistakenly tries to single-handedly complete a battle he began decades ago against Acronix, one of the twin Hands of Time. But the arrival of the first Time Blade - a weapon with the power to speed up time - sends the Ninja to the Monastery just in time to rescue their master from certain doom.

2.title: The Hatching
2.plot: The Ninja learn more about the Krux and Acronix - the two fallen Elemental Masters known as the Hands of Time - and are sure that this threat has finally been eliminated. But with Wu out of action and suffering from the effects of the Time Punch, the Ninja discover a new enemy in their midst: The Vermillion Warriors. And the Ninjas have no idea who controls them.

3.title: A Time of Traitors
3.plot: Kai's investigation of a Vermillion Warrior Helmet leads him to discover that Krux is alive and well in Ninjago, living under an assumed identity. Meanwhile, as the Vermillion Warriors go on a kidnapping spree, Lloyd struggles with his role as master-in-training and Nya does her best to reboot Zane, who was knocked off line in his first battle with the Vermillion.

4.title: Scavengers
4.plot: In the midst of an epidemic of mysterious metal thefts by the Vermillion Warriors, Lloyd realizes that stepping up and taking over for the ailing Master Wu is not an easy task.

5.title: A Line in the Sand
5.plot: While the Ninja fight to save MegaMonster Amusement Park, Jay struggles to defend his family's home from the Vermillion Warriors. But the arrival of the Emerald Time Blade, with its ability to slow time, leads to a desert chase as our heroes try to reach the Blade before the snakes get it.

6.title: The Attack
6.plot: The Ninja celebrate their escape from the Vermillion Army and their retrieval of the Emerald Time Blade, but with Acronix and Krux determined to get their Blade back, the Airjitzu Temple becomes a battleground.

7.title: Secrets Discovered
7.plot: Secrets are revealed as Nya confronts the Samurai X imposter, Kai pursues the truth about his parents and the other Ninja desperately seek to locate and rescue Master Wu. But as usual, some answers only lead to more questions.

8.title: Pause and Effect
8.plot: Kai confronts his dad for aiding the Hands of Time, only to discover that his parents are actually Acronix and Krux's captives. Meanwhile, as the Ninja work to free Wu, Cyrus Borg and the rest of the Hands of Time's captives, a third Time Blade arrives - one with the power to temporarily stop time.

9.title: Out of the Fire and Into the Boiling Sea
9.plot: The Hands of Time blackmail Kai and Nya into using their combined Elemental powers to retrieve the fourth and final Time Blade from the Boiling Sea with the promise that the siblings can use its reversal power to save the quickly-fading Master Wu. Meanwhile, the Ninja and Cyrus Borg get unexpected help from Samurai X as they attempt to destroy the Hands of Time's time-travelling snake mech before it's operational.

10.title: Lost in Time
10.plot: Kai and Nya stow away aboard Krux and Acronix's time travelling snake mech in a desperate attempt to save Master Wu. But when they arrive in the past, they must help the Elemental Masters prevent the Hands of Time from literally re-writing Ninjago history. Meanwhile, the the Ninja remain in the rapidly-shifting present trying to help Kai and Nya's father, who was hit with a Time Punch.

1.title: The Mask of Deception
1.plot: Lloyd discovers that there are a group of bandits that follow Lord Garmadon even though Garmadon is dead

2.title: The Jade Princess
2.plot: The Ninja go to the palace in order to protect princess Harumi and the Oni Mask of Deception from the Sons of Garmadon.

3.title: The Oni and the Dragon
3.plot: After a vicious attack in the palace, Lloyd and Jay are trying to find more information about the Oni Masks, while Zane and Cole are trying to go undercover and enter the S.O.G.

4.title: Snake Jaguar
4.plot: Zane also known as Snake Jaguar participates in an insane imitation race in order to join the Sons of Garmadon.

5.title: Dead Man's Squall
5.plot: After finding out a trap was planted on their ship, the ninja struggle to defend the Destiny's Bounty.

6.title: The Quiet One
6.plot: As Lloyd and Harumi venture deep into Primeval's Eye in search of the third Oni Mask, the ninja attempt to fix the Bounty and make a startling discovery.

7.title: Game of Masks
7.plot: As Lloyd and Harumi search the Oni Temple for the last mask, the ninja is taken a hostage and discover Princess Harumi's true intentions.

8.title: Dread on Arrival
8.plot: The Ninja appeal to the Police Commissioner of Ninjago in an effort to help save Lloyd and thwart Harumi's efforts to resurrect the evil Lord Garmadon.

9.title: True Potential
9.plot: Just when the Ninja think they have saved the day, Lord Garmadon returns to Ninjago, and frees Harumi, who encourages him to "achieve his True Potential" by conquering the one thing that has always stood in his way - his son, Lloyd.

10.title: Big Trouble, Little Ninjago
10.plot: The Ninja race to save Lloyd, as a more powerful-than-ever Lord Garmadon creates an enormous Colossi to help him rule Ninjago and defeat the ninja.

1.title: Firstbourne
1.plot: Emperor Garmadon has taken control of Ninjago City where Lloyd retreats to the shadows. Meanwhile, the other Ninja and Young Wu are shipwrecked in the Realm of Oni and Dragon and find they are not alone.

2.title: Iron & Stone
2.plot: The Ninja are captured by Iron Baron and must fight in an arena. Meanwhile Mr. E pays for his failure.

3.title: Radio Free Ninjago
3.plot: Lloyd must find his voice as he leads a small resistance to capture the airwaves in Ninjago City. Meanwhile in the First Realm, Iron Baron takes the Ninja on a dragon hunt.

4.title: How to Build a Dragon
4.plot: While Lloyd and the rebels celebrate their successful strike against Emperor Garmadon, in the Realm of Oni and Dragon, the Ninja dare an elaborate escape from the clutches of Iron Baron and his Dragon Hunters.

5.title: The Gilded Path
5.plot: The headquarters of the resistance is breached and Lloyd scrambles to avoid capture. Meanwhile, the Ninja are caught by Heavy Metal, but find an unlikely ally.

6.title: Two Lies, One Truth
6.plot: As Lloyd unmasks Mystake for who she truly is, Emperor Garmadon embraces Harumi as his daughter of darkness. Meanwhile, Wu holds onto faith as he leads his friends into dangerous Oni territory in the hope of finding Firstbourne's nest.

7.title: The Weakest Link
7.plot: Lloyd turns the tables on Harumi to take his father's power away, and the Ninja learn what it takes to be a Dragon Hunter.

8.title: Saving Faith
8.plot: Lloyd and his team plot to take control of the Oni Titan. Meanwhile in the First Realm, the Ninja fall into Iron Baron's clutches and an old master returns.

9.title: Lessons for a Master
9.plot: When Iron Baron forces Wu to retrieve the Dragon Armor, things don't go as planned. In NINJAGO, Lloyd can only endure so much as he holds onto hope for the Ninjas' return.

10.title: Green Destiny
10.plot: The Ninja finally return home and unite to stop Emperor Garmadon, forcing Lloyd to make a decision that will forever change NINJAGO.

-1.title: Part 9 - Prophecy of the Green Ninja
-1.plot: The final puzzle forces each ninja to question the true meaning of the Green Ninja Prophecy, but success is not what it seems.

imdb.plot outline: Long before time had a name, Ninjago was created by the First Spinjitzu Master by using the Four Elemental Weapons of Spinjitzu; weapons so powerful, no one can handle all of their power at once. When he passed away, his two sons swore to protect them, but the oldest, Lord Garmadon, was consumed by darkness and wanted to possess them all. A battle between brothers broke out and Lord Garmadon was struck down and banished to the Underworld. Peace returned to Ninjago as the younger brother, Sensei Wu, hid the elemental weapons in the far corners of Ninjago. Centuries later, Lord Garmadon has returned with the help of his Skeleton army to collect the Golden Weapons. Sensei Wu turns to the aid of four young Ninja who are to be trained to become the protectors of each of the weapons. Although the Ninja successfully survive a harrowing quest to retrieve the elemental weapons, they fall into Lord Garmadon's master plan, releasing the dark Lord from his prison, and allowing him to escape through a vortex, with hope that he would one day return with the ability to possess all four weapons. Peace has returned to Ninjago, while the four ninja swear to protect and learn to master their Golden Weapons... Awaiting Lord Garmadon's return.
imdb.title: Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
plot: When the fate of their world, Ninjago, is challenged by great threats, it's up to the ninja: Kai, Jay, Cole, Zane, Lloyd and Nya to save the world.::tristinc33

Long before time had a name, Ninjago was created by the First Spinjitzu Master by using the Four Elemental Weapons of Spinjitzu; weapons so powerful, no one can handle all of their power at once. When he passed away, his two sons swore to protect them, but the oldest, Lord Garmadon, was consumed by darkness and wanted to possess them all. A battle between brothers broke out and Lord Garmadon was struck down and banished to the Underworld. Peace returned to Ninjago as the younger brother, Sensei Wu, hid the elemental weapons in the far corners of Ninjago. Centuries later, Lord Garmadon has returned with the help of his Skeleton army to collect the Golden Weapons. Sensei Wu turns to the aid of four young Ninja who are to be trained to become the protectors of each of the weapons. Although the Ninja successfully survive a harrowing quest to retrieve the elemental weapons, they fall into Lord Garmadon's master plan, releasing the dark Lord from his prison, and allowing him to escape through a vortex, with hope that he would one day return with the ability to possess all four weapons. Peace has returned to Ninjago, while the four ninja swear to protect and learn to master their Golden Weapons... Awaiting Lord Garmadon's return.::Anonymous
